"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552f03426368724e6c460100#post_552f03426368724e6c460100
A lot of animals are angry fuckers.
You just really want to punch them in the face but then animal protection comes by and goes "Nnnope!" and skedaddles off.

Animals are angry because unlike us, they don't have a stable society *or* is made out of a thousand year old religion that says "As hippos, we must steal crops and be a jerk because we follow Hippo God".

I really hate certain animals.
